articles.title: World Cup: India look for early wickets against New Zealand
articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as India play New Zealand in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.content:
India: Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (wk), Suryakumar Yadav, Ravindra Jadeja, Mohammed Shami, Kuldeep Yadav, Mohammed Siraj, Jasprit Bumrah.

articles.author: Mathias Döpfner
articles.title: Microsoft CEO talks AI, Activision Blizzard deal, regrets, more
articles.description: Satya Nadella sat down with Axel Springer CEO Mathias Döpfner to talk OpenAI, cricket, and his biggest professional regret and best decision so far.
articles.content:
Mathias Döpfner, the CEO of Insider's parent company, Axel Springer, recently met with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella for a wide-ranging interview.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
